alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:27PM CDT until July 28 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Buchanan County in northeastern Iowa... Benton County in east central Iowa... Northwestern Linn County in east central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Washburn to near La Porte City to near Union Grove State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Vinton, Robins, Center Point, Urbana, Dysart, Palo, Shellsburg, Walker, Alburnett, Garrison, Brandon, Mount Auburn, Toddville, Troy Mills, Vinton Memorial Airport, Minne Estema Park, Benton County Fairgrounds, Wildcat Bluff Park, Cheney and Lime Creek County Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
